#summary Sensors for PRTG Network Monitor.
#sidebar Main_Sidebar

=Introduction=

PRTG can be extended writing Custom Sensors (executables, WMI scripts, powershell scripts, etc.) On this page you can find Custom Sensors for *PRTG version 8 or later*.

Currently available sensors from:

 * PRTG Tools Family
     # [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki\PTF_Custom_Sensors Standard Sensors]
     # [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki\PTF_Custom_Sensors_XML Advanced Sensors]  http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/Advanced_Sensor_Small.png
